players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I have information to share: Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out to protect the town."
Bob: "Charlie, that's a baseless accusation! Why target me without proof? Maybe you're the one hiding something."
You: "Charlie, how did you get your information on Bob? We need more details before deciding."
Bob: "Alice is right; Charlie's accusation lacks proof. If he's the detective, why not share more? This could be a distraction from the real mafia."
You: "Charlie, if you have proof, share it now so we can make the right vote."
Charlie: "I understand the need for proof, but as the detective, my investigation is confidential. I trust you all to believe me and vote Bob out before he harms more of us."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I have information to share: Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out to protect the town."
Bob: "Charlie, that's a baseless accusation! Why target me without proof? Maybe you're the one hiding something."
Alice: "Charlie, how did you get your information on Bob? We need more details before deciding."
Bob: "Alice is right; Charlie's accusation lacks proof. If he's the detective, why not share more? This could be a distraction from the real mafia."
Alice: "Charlie, if you have proof, share it now so we can make the right vote."
You: "I understand the need for proof, but as the detective, my investigation is confidential. I trust you all to believe me and vote Bob out before he harms more of us."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
